commit message: Incremented the Version code value to fix the signing issue on the PB. Ref:http://supportforums.blackberry.com/t5/Testing-and-Deployment/Code-signing-request-failed-because-this-file-has-been/ta-p/798291

Fixes #319 by adding guess for xmlrpc.php path. If we get to the end of all the checks with no xmlrpc path, show an error. (this way if someone enters yahoo.com they get a friendly message instead of a parsing error)
Fixes #311, moves the UI touching method out of DoInBackground().
Finish the activity if there's no valid Post object attached.
Initialize the date variables in onCreate, should fix #310
Catch out of memory error for trac #314.
Added row to blog drop down to add a new account. Fixes #279
updated build number
updated build number in manifest file.
Finish EditPost activity if we don't have a current blog object. Added 'tvdpi' layout for Nexus 7.
Updated danish translation string. Ref: http://dev.android.wordpress.org/2012/07/04/hey-just-want-to-address-a-little-issue/
Updated version number.
Incremented the Version code value to sign and submit the app for BlackBerry 10 Alpha.
Removed the method 'isPlayBook' and added a more generic method 'isBlackBerry'. BlackBerry 10 is coming and we are ready for it!
Use a more generic title 'WordPress for BlackBerry' instead of 'PlayBook'.
Bumped the version code value again to sign the app for a BlackBerry 10 Alpha release.
Fixes crash reported by user, tapping the 'load more' row after it was already tapped would cause an out of index f/c.
Perform the post save database operations in the background thread. Significantly improves performance when refreshing posts.
Removing unused iVars
Remove loadPosts call from bg thread.
Updated the preferences screen for the BlackBerry version.
HttpURLConnection returns a 403 when a query arg is on the url, changed to HttpClient with an HttpGet. Fixes #329
updating build number, removed debug flag.
Actually removing debug flag :)
Changed content field hint to hint that you can add media by tapping the content field.
Added support for improved WPCOM signup. Fixes #331
Don't allow the refresh icon to be tappable while it's animating. Should help issue reported in comment on ticket #325
Adding patch from #333. Props frankkanis
Removing unused import
Attempt to catch OutOfMemoryError when adding an image to the Library
Moved post id creation to try/catch block to help EditPost activity recover if there's no valid currentBlog.
Removing yet another unused import.
Cleaned up some compiler warnings in ImageHelper.java
Changed where imeBack boolean is set to properly keep track of editor state. Fixes #337
Catch OOM error in ImageHelper.java
Don't show alert dialogs if the activity is finishing.
Make sure tagline_value is not null when checking for flag.
Added build configuration for build server
Removed more unused global vars.
Adding EditPost.java cleanup patch from #340, minus one error in strings.xml
Noticed that xmlrpc temp files were being saved to SD card, changed it to save to app directory for increased security.
Set mImeBackPressed to true when presenting the image settings dialog. Fixes getting save post prompt when pressing back after dismissing dialog.

Adding cleanup patch from frankkanis. Also cleaned up a few warnings, removed a few more WordPressDB calls and removed a pointless setTitle call that isn't used any longer in AddAccount. Refs #338. props frankkanis

Fixes #342 by removing check for large image. Fixed up setting 'Original Size' in the blog's settings as it appears this setting stopped working after the change that added support for custom sized linked images. Also set touchScreen required to false to experiment with the app on Google TV.
Strings file was infested with newline characters, which makes glotpress output the newlines as well.
Adding script to upload translations from GlotPress, and the latest strings as well.
BS translation fix.
Fixed zh-rTW folder
Removing old folder
Don't update the list unless we had a successful download of posts. Fixes #345
